```{r}


df$DefRankCat <- cut(df$Def.Rank,
                     breaks = quantile(df$Def.Rank, probs = c(0, .25, .50, .75, 1), na_rm = TRUE),
                     include.lowest = TRUE,
                     labels = c("Top 25%", "25–50%", "50–75%", "Bottom 25%"))

boxplot(df$Win ~ df$DefRankCat,
        ylab = "Wins",
        xlab = "Defensive Rank Category",
        main = "Wins by Defensive Rank Category",
        col = "lightblue")

```

```{r}
vars <- c("Win", "Def.Rank", "Fumbles.Recovered", "Points.Allowed", "Total.TDs.Allowed", "Average.Sacks.per.Game", "Def.Plays", "Loss" )
summary_table <- data.frame(
  Variable = vars,
  Mean = sapply(df[vars], mean, na.rm = TRUE),
  Median = sapply(df[vars], median, na.rm = TRUE)
)

summary_table
```
